sentences.en: He ran over the lists of homeleases which were about to expire.
sentences.cn: 他翻阅了房屋租赁契约快要到期的清单.

sentences.en: His term of office as president will expire next year.
sentences.cn: 他的总统任期明年将届满.

sentences.en: My lease will expire on September 30 th of this year.
sentences.cn: 我的租约今年九月三十日到期.
我的护照下周就到期了。

sentences.en: My season ticket will expire this week.
My subscription to the magazine will soon expire, I will renew it.
sentences.cn: 我订阅的杂志快到期了, 我将续订.

sentences.en: Once their markers expire, they could be stuck there forever?
sentences.cn: 一旦他们的传导器无效了他们就可能永远留在那儿?

sentences.en: Ophelia expires in Act IV of Hamlet.
sentences.cn: 奥菲莉娅在《哈姆雷特》第四幕中死去。

sentences.en: Our trade agreement with China will expire next year.
sentences.cn: 我国同中国的贸易协定明年期满.

sentences.en: Our trade agreement with Holland will expire at the end of this year.
sentences.cn: 我国同荷兰的贸易协定今年年底期满.

sentences.en: players whose contracts expire this summer
sentences.cn: 合约于今年夏天到期的运动员

sentences.en: The chairman’s term of office has already expired.
The coalition could break down before the five years expire .
sentences.cn: 此次联合可能在五年期限结束之前就破裂。

sentences.en: The French company's concession would expire in 1904.
sentences.cn: 法国公司的特许权将于1904年满期.

sentences.en: We expire used air from our lungs.
When does your driving licence expire?
sentences.cn: 你的驾照什么时候到期？

sentences.en: When does your driving licence expire?
sentences.cn: 你的驾驶执照何时到期?

trans.tran_en: if a period of time when someone has a particular position of authority expires, it ends

trans.tran_cn: 期满， 终止； 断气， 死亡
trans.tran_en: if a period of time when someone has a particular position of authority expires, it ends
